about.intro: I have a bachelor's in computer engineering from St. Cloud State University (SCSU) and currently work at 3M as an Application Analyst. I spend my free time doing variety of things like firmware and application development, PCB design, fishing, cooking, problem solving, etc. I am always in the lookout for great challenge and enjoy a beer at the local bar.

projects.title: Nerdboard
projects.projectDesc: Interactive online whiteboard to brainstorm, do homework, or just doddle!

projects.title: Slices of the 4th Dimension!
projects.projectDesc: This app plots any 3D cross section of a 4D object. On the left is the fimilar concept of the Conic Sections, and on the right is the plot of the 3D cross section.

projects.title: Find a number of length n in the Fibonacci Sequence
projects.projectDesc: Find a number of length 'n' from the Fibonacci Sequence, the app was inspired by a question hosted on ProjectEuler.net.
